channel.title: Need help with this issue
channel.description:
I have been having this problem with my compiler for a long time. I am not sure if I messed up in the client or not. Please skype or TV me please.
[img]http://imgur.com/9ylfkrq[/img]

item.title: Need help with this issue
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:5, topic:552156”][quote author=WarTusk-RSPS link=topic=671072.msg4487770#msg4487770 date=1435348729]
Thanks for clearing that up Sk8r! Also how did you fix that image? I have come across that problem a few times but never knew how to fix it.
[/quote]

You have to run it with the -Xlint flag for it to tell you why it’s doing that.[/quote]
He wanted to know how to fix the image, not the actual warnings

WarTusks:
When posting images you need to use the DIRECT LINK.
If you go to this page (The original image link you supplied): http://imgur.com/9ylfkrq
You can do 2 things:

  1. Right click the image, and hit copy image url. Then use image tags around that.

  2. Click the “Get embed codes” and then copy the “BBCode (message boards & forums)” link and directly paste that.

When you initially upload an image to imgur, it takes you to the page like you see in #2, so you can directly copy the BBCode link.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this issue
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

WarTusk-RSPS:

Thanks for clearing that up Sk8r! Also how did you fix that image? I have come across that problem a few times but never knew how to fix it.

You have to run it with the -Xlint flag for it to tell you why it’s doing that.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this issue
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

Thanks for clearing that up Sk8r! Also how did you fix that image? I have come across that problem a few times with my images but never knew how to fix it.

item.title: Need help with this issue
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“WarTusk-RSPS, post:1, topic:552156”]I have been having this problem with my compiler for a long time. I am not sure if I messed up in the client or not. Please skype or TV me please.

[/quote]
Fixed your image.
And you’re not having a problem. That says it compiled successfully…
It says if you’d like to see the warnings, to compile using the -Xlint flag.
If you had errors, it would say
"X errors…
Press any key to continue…"

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this issue
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

The picture is invalid. Also, there’s no point in a forum if everyone just helped each other on Skype or Teamviewer. We’ll gladly help you here.
